content: Can someone guide to map the HL7 information to Location FHIR resource? I don't see any information in the mapping section? Thanks for your time.
By "HL7 information" do you mean v2? (HL7 encompasses v2, v3, CDA, FHIR and a bunch of other things). @Brian Postlethwaite Why aren't there v2 mappings on Location - presume it should map to LOC?
@Cooper Thompson is this something we can add?
@Lloyd McKenzie yeap, sorry for the confusion. I mean the v2 messages.

I don't think I've ever seen the LOC segment used. The V2-to-FHIR project does have a mapping for the PL data type to Location (although it gets a bit complicate because it creates a series of Locations for the bed, room, facility, etc). Check out https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17b4wqJOzGieNBSdHYZt3ymKucsRDd_h8leaiz_umG7E/edit#gid=0 and let us know if you have thoughts on the mapping
I second Craig's comments - I've only ever seen location in HL7v2 be sent in the context of something else (e.g. PV1, FT1, etc.) using the PL data type.
Thanks @Craig Newman and @Cooper Thompson for sharing your views. I guess that i can map with PL or LOC segement, whatever is being used in the system. Is that right?
